Package goal.core.mentalstate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeliefBase
    A belief base is a Database with generic handling and querying capabilities.
    GoalBase
    A goal base consists of a set of individual or single goals.
    MentalModel
    A MentalModel is a belief base and a stack of goal bases.
    MentalState
    Represents a mental state of an agent and provides query and update functionality.
    SingleGoal
    Stores a Database, Update pair that represent a single goal.
    Theory
    Represents a set of formulas that have been inserted into a corresponding database.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BASETYPE
    Different (data)base types that are used in GOAL.
